name: mapbox-to-ol-style
description: Create OpenLayers style functions from Mapbox Style objects
author: Andreas Hocevar <andreas.hocevar@gmail.com>

scripts.prepublish: npm run doc && mkdir -p dist && browserify -g [ babelify --plugins [ add-module-exports transform-es2015-modules-commonjs ] ] -p [ standalonify --name mb2olstyle --deps [ null --ol/style/style ol.style.Style --ol/style/fill ol.style.Fill --ol/style/stroke ol.style.Stroke --ol/style/circle ol.style.Circle --ol/style/icon ol.style.Icon --ol/style/text ol.style.Text ] ] index.js > dist/mb2olstyle.js
scripts.test: browserify -g [ babelify --plugins [ transform-es2015-modules-commonjs ] ] test/test.js > test/test-bundle.js && mocha test/test-bundle.js && rm test/test-bundle.js
